facility1.title: Conference Room
facility1.text: A spacious conference room with large seating area for up to 200 people. It includes a projector, whiteboard, and a sound system.

facility2.title: Meeting Room
facility2.text: A large meeting room with a large seating area for up to 100 people. It includes a projector, whiteboard, and a sound system.

facility3.title: Executive Lounge
facility3.text: A luxurious space for relaxation and networking. Features comfortable seating and beverages. Ideal for unwinding or business meetings.

testimonial1.name: John Doe
testimonial1.text: This residence has been a great experience for my business. I highly recommend it to others.

testimonial2.name: Jane Smith
testimonial2.text: I have always wanted to stay in a luxury hotel. This residence has made my dream come true.

testimonial3.name: Mike Johnson
testimonial3.text: I can't believe I found this perfect place for my new business. I can't wait to share my experiences with others.

testimonial4.name: Sarah Williams
testimonial4.text: I'm so thrilled to have found this residence. The staff is friendly and the location is perfect for my business.

testimonial5.name: David Brown
testimonial5.text: I'm so grateful for the chance to stay in this residence. The location is perfect for my business.

testimonial6.name: Michael Davis
testimonial6.text: I'm so happy I found this residence. The location is perfect for my business.
